title: Sail Into Danger
overview: In this adventure, an American is forced by smugglers to sail his boat from Barcelona to Tangiers. The ruthless fugitives then kill his son, and harm his shipmate, sending the pilot, himself an ex-smuggler into such a rage that he kills two gang members and helps police capture the survivors and bring them to justice.

title: The Vintage
overview: A young Italian fugitive and his older protective brother hide among the grape pickers at a vineyard in Provence.
tagline: THEY WERE PEOPLE OF THE EARTH! LUSTY! VIOLENT! PRIMITIVE!

title: In Cold Blood
overview: Carlos a young man who lives in the suburbs of the big city has ambitions and wants to change his life. Influenced by friends of doubtful moral character, habituated to frequent harmful environments. Little by little, he begins to see himself doomed to crime and one day he abandons his girlfriend, María, for Isabel, an attractive and intelligent woman who plays with him and takes him wherever he wants. When Carlos, once he has committed a robbery, realizes the nature of Isabel and his friends, and that he will never be happy in that environment, he tries to go back, but the violence of the facts will lead him to a bloodthirsty outcome.

title: The Mill of Good Luck
overview: Follows the inner transformation of a man who tried to fight his demon, the love for money, and lost.

title: The Silken Affair
overview: An accountant who is creative with his firm's books uses the money to fund a romantic spree.
tagline: He Was A Model Husband - She Was A Model

title: Pas de souris dans le business
overview: Without seeming to touch it, journalist Trupeau is interested in the doings of Mireille, a jewelry store saleswoman. A certain Jojo is hanging around the young girl, and not for the right reasons, but to pull off a "heist". Although one of his men betrays him and has to be shot, Jojo succeeds. The police investigate, question and pursue Mireille. Exasperated and disillusioned, the pretty salesgirl shoots Jojo. Fortunately, the journalist is there to prove that she's as white as an ermine. And the ch timents rain down on the culprits.

title: Unchained
overview: This fact-based prison drama tells the tale of a band of prisoners living in the innovative 2,600-acre prison at Chino, California. The place takes a humanistic approach to reform and there are no armed guards, no lockups and no uniforms. The underlying philosophy is that if these things are not there, the prisoners will not want to escape, and will instead accept their punishment. A new inmate arrives and soon accustoms himself to the new idea. The story includes the Oscar nominated song Unchained Melody.
tagline: What keeps them from crashing out?

title: Scandal in Zamalek
overview: A man and his sister-in-law are suspects in a murder; they do not know that the man's wife is involved.

title: Street of Sinners
overview: A rookie New York cop has to deal with juvenile delinquents, his superiors, and blame for the suicide of a woman who jumped to her death while he was in her apartment.
tagline: Only the Devil is the Winner... on the Street of Sinners...!

title: These Dangerous Years
overview: A Liverpool gang member wins a singing contest is then called up for National Service where he clashes with another soldier.

title: Child of Sorrow
overview: A war hero forced to participate in a smuggling ring meets a prostitute in the postwar ruins of Manila.

title: Grabenplatz 17
overview: Murder mystery about the disappearance of a boy who has leukaemia following the murder of his mother, which he witnessed.

title: The Notorious Mr. Monks
overview: A drunken driver, his wife and a hitchhiker equals murder.
tagline: A man who fought and murdered... for a woman he couldn't possess!

title: Betrayed Women
overview: Love-starved gun molls (Carole Mathews, Beverly Michaels) escape from a prison farm where matrons make their lives miserable.
tagline: Female Devil's Island... the place nobody knows except the girls nobody wants!

title: Adventure in Rio
overview: A remake of the 1940 film of the same title. It was shot on location in Brazil with separate German and Italian versions.

title: Flesh Pier
overview: Director Teruo Ishi's crime action follows the investigative adventures of an undercover cop working with a prostitution ring. It's done in an unique documentary style.

title: Confession
overview: A confession to a priest from a thief leads to the priest's life being threatened by his gang.
tagline: The Door Past Which No Law Could Go

title: The Rest Is Silence
overview: 'The Rest Is Silence, a German-made attempt to update Shakespeare, is one of the best and least self-conscious of this minor genre. As indicated by the title, the film's script is a "mufti" version of Hamlet, with young Hardy Krüger trying to prove that his uncle has killed his father. Direct references to the Shakespeare original abound, right down to the re-enactment of the crime for the benefit of the Uncle and the periodic appearances of the ghost of the hero's father.'

production_companies.name: Freie Film Produktion GmbH & Co., Hamburg

title: Passion and Rifle Bullets
overview: Private Detective Ippei Shizuno faces off against a serial killer and a wealthy woman's society who runs an illegal gun trade.

title: Hot Summer Night
overview: An out-of-work reporter (Leslie Nielsen) seeks out a bank robber, and his bride (Colleen Miller) has to rescue him.
tagline: Hot with the blast of gunfire!

title: Confess, Dr. Corda
overview: A doctor goes to meet a beautiful girl at a park bench near a wooded area. When he arrives, he finds her battered body lying next to a stream! He then finds himself to be the prime suspect. Who's the killer?

title: Seventeen Days till Execution
overview: Seventeen days till execution.

title: Where the Circle Ends
overview: A woman murders her lover. Her husband and his mistress are also having murder-shaped thoughts, and their three counterplots all get tangled together. Everybody loses.

title: The Perjured Farmer
overview: Mathias Ferner commits perjury and is thus able to secure the farm of his stepbrother Jakob as soon as he dies. In doing so, he deprives Paula Roth and the children of their inheritance. However, there is a letter incriminating Mathias Ferner. Years later, Paula Roth gets her hands on this letter.

title: Diamond Machine
overview: A group of bandits conspire to kidnap a scientist who can help them manufacture diamonds.Unbeknownst to them , the FBI is already on their case.

title: The Surgeon's Knife
overview: A doctor becomes the victim of extortionists when one of his patients dies under questionable circumstances.
tagline: Knifed Edged Tension

title: The Young Go Wild
overview: High school student Fabian König is kicked out of school and starts a gang that specializes in theft. He falls in love with the orphan girl Ulla, but she rejects him when she finds out how he spends his time. When the pimp Horst tries to rape Ulla, she is rescued by Fabian. Shortly afterwards, Horst's body is found and Fabian is convicted of the murder due to the false testimony of a witness. In prison, he comes to trust the prison doctor Dr. Knittel, who believes him and is able to unmask the real culprit.
tagline: Teenage Passions run riot!

title: Lilli, a Girl from the Big City
overview: The frenzied reporter Lilli is just great: she shoots with both hands and lays her opponents with Jiu-Jitsu while the guys fall to the ground with just one look from her! Now she is to attend a missionary convention in Sicily. Nothing special? The apparently routine job develops into a murder case.

title: The Price of Silence
overview: Roger Fenton has been released from prison and stared to build a new life. But his past catches up when an elderly visitor is murdered in his office.

title: Cop Hater
overview: Members of the 87th Precinct search for a cop killer who has already murdered two of their own.
tagline: Cop Bait! She winks... she loves... she kills... and it's always a guy with a badge!

title: The Silent Kill
overview: Retired football player and current P. I. Brock Callahan (Ken Clark) is hired to investigate the death of a decorator. The police think it's a suicide, but Callahan's not so sure. Directed by Don Siegel from a script by Stirling Silliphant as the pilot for a CBS television show called "Brock Callahan" which was not picked up.

title: Story of a rope
overview: Two men and a woman that blackmail a woman will pay for their actions.

title: Rajo to satsujin-meiro
overview: Japanese crime film.

title: Counterplot
overview: Man hides out in Puerto Rico from the police and his double-crossing attorney.

title: Casebooks of Dandy Sashichi: Naked Princess and Mysterious Bear Man
overview: This time around, Sashichi is investigating a case of serial murders believed to be perpetrated by a giant bear.

title: Bunco Busters
overview: A member of the Bunco squad introduces the Case of the Gullible Woodpecker. It seems that Woody wins a pot full of dough that con man Buzz Buzzard notices and sets his sights on stealing. He leads Woody on a phony treasure hunt on Cataloni Island where all the materials Woody needs to continue the hunt (treasure maps, fire extinguishers, toll bridges, etc.) cost him a bundle.

title: The Flesh Is Weak
overview: Giani is a pimp who preys on the naïve, ‘just off the bus’ young women who come to post-war London for fortune.
tagline: The Newest Headlines On The Oldest Profession!

title: The Vivanco Ladies
overview: Two women of lesser descent are dedicated to stealing to support their brother's daughter.

title: With my finger on the trigger
overview: The Private detective Raúl Marín with the help of his grandmother and the police commander Aragón try to find out the murder of several homicides in three episodes: El Anónimo, El Ídolo and El Hipnotizador.
tagline: The movie consisted of three segments (El Anónimo), (El Idolo) and (El Hipnotizador)

title: Runaway Daughters
overview: Three teenagers with troubled families are unable to adjust at home and in high-school. Tempted with an easy, carefree life they soon pass from misdemeanors into serious crime - and will suffer for it. Sometimes, repentance comes too late.
tagline: They called her "JAILBAIT"!

title: Scared to Death
overview: A young woman hires Viruta y Capulina to find a notorious jewel thief, known as Rostov.

title: The Enigma of the Folies-Bergère
overview: The Raffin Commissioner investigates the murder of an industrialist and it soon becomes apparent that the activities of the relatives of the deceased all revolve around the Folies-Bergere.

title: The Delavine Affair
overview: Peter Reynolds stars as Rex Banner, a newspaperman who makes it his life's mission to track down a vicious gang of thieves. When his informant winds up dead, Rex finds himself framed for murder.

title: The Narrowing Circle
overview: A journalist is framed for the murder of a rival and has to prove his innocence, whatever the cost.
tagline: POLICE DRAGNET CLOSES IN ON A KILLER!

title: Johnny Rocco
overview: Gangster and police look for a gangster's son who witnessed a murder.
tagline: If You See This Boy... HIDE HIM!

title: Behind the Headlines
overview: Newspaper reporters compete with London police to solve a murder.

title: Tiger in the Smoke
overview: In wartime, a young officer is killed during a raid to kill a German general at the house that used to belong to his grandmother. Before he dies he talks about a treasure that was hidden there. Several years later, the members of that group are still together as a street band living in a cellar. The last of the gang, who was chosen for his skills as a ruthless killer, escapes from prison in a rampage of killing and, obsessed with the treasure, takes the gang to France to recover it.
tagline: A killer - savage, relentless, evil, loose in the city's fog he becomes a...

title: The Day the Rains Came
overview: A motorcycle gang in post-war Germany wreaks havok on a town, until one of their members begins to have second thoughts after a run-in with the police.

title: The Brain Machine
overview: A British psychiatrist reads an amnesiac's (Maxwell Reed) brain waves and sees the mind of a killer.
tagline: The waves of the BRAIN MACHINE spell STOP THIS KILLER!

title: Merciless Bullet
overview: Killer Kenji Sasagawa (Odaka) enters the room of a luxurious apartment in the silence of the night and, finding himself in front of the boss of the Sawamura clan (Kaneko), who is with his mistress, impassively pulls the trigger of a pistol with a silencer. Kenji was hired by Sawamura's advisor, Matsumoto (Ashida). It was a cunning plan: eliminate Sawamura, sell the smuggling rights to the Hamasaki clan and make a profit. And for Kenji, the motive did not matter, as long as he was paid, his job was to kill opponents without a miss.…

title: Murder at Site 3
overview: Sexton Blake tracks down a gang who have stolen secrets from a rocket site.

title: On Call...Murder!
overview: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.

title: Passport to Treason
overview: After being consulted by a friend concerning a murder case, a private eye learns the friend has become the next victim. Passport to Treason was put together by Robert S. Baker and Monty Berman, the same team who’d later collaborate on the UK TV series The Saint.  Rod Cameron stars as an American private eye, stationed in London.  For the sake of a murdered friend, the detective takes over the dead man’s case, which turns out to have international ramifications.  The villains are members of a phony pacifistic society, all of whom harbor plans for taking over the world.

title: No Road Back
overview: A blind and deaf woman dedicates her life and sacrifices all she has for her son, a good-for-nothing troublemaker who gets mixed up with a criminal gang that tries to frame him for a robbery.

title: The Gelignite Gang
overview: A tense thriller that tears the lid off Soho's underworld and reveals the cunning organization behind a gang of safe-breakers who will stop at nothing, not even murder, to achieve their goals.

title: The Green Van
overview: It is 1920. After three years of the Russian Civil War, communist government is finally established in Odessa. Young Volodya Kozachenko, who dreams of being a detective like Sherlock Holmes, joins the newly forming Odessa Criminal Police.

title: The Purple Gang
overview: The story of the infamous Purple Gang - a ring of bootleggers, hijackers and killers in 1920's Detroit.
tagline: When machine gun mania rocked the nation!

title: Who Done It?
overview: This movie debut for saucy British TV comic Benny Hill has Benny leaving his job as a sweeper after winning some money. He becomes a private detective and investigates a plot to assassinate British scientists.

title: Give 'em Hell
overview: During the 1950s, in Portuguese Mozambique, small-time American hustler, ex-soldier, ex-boxer and adventurer Johnny Jordan is looking for a new gig. His opportunity comes in the form of a local shipping tycoon and importer Moreno who offers Johnny a job after Johnny saves Moreno from an armed mugger on the waterfront.

title: That Night
overview: Jean, who is the artistic director of a fashion magazine, is married to a very pretty cover girl, Sylvie. They both work for André Reverdy, a very cynical man, who openly covets Sylvie.

title: La adúltera
overview: Jilted lover takes revenge on her ex's new wife.

title: The Man in the Road
overview: A brilliant scientist who has lost his memory is hunted by Communist agents out to obtain a secret formula.
tagline: Would his captive mind betray his secret?

title: Little Red Monkey
overview: Several murders of nuclear scientists, that baffles Scotland Yard, occur in London about the same time that Bill Locklin, a special officer from the United States State Department, arrives to oversee the transfer of Professor Leon Dushenko, a Russian scientist who as fled the U.S.S.R. An attempt is made on Dushenko's life with a monkey's paw-print found at the scene.
tagline: THE IMPOSSIBLE CRIME

title: Cross Channel
overview: Charter-boat owner "Tex" Parker is framed on a murder rap by a gang of jewel-and-American currency smugglers operating from the coasts of England and France, with a mid-channel rendezvous. The smugglers use him, his boat and partner, "Soapy", to carry their goods back and forth across the English. During one of the trips, "Tex" is thrown overboard, but is picked up by a French fishing boat and the fisherman take him back to their village, Porte Soliare, where he meets Jacqueline. People who appear to be quite dead early on turn out to be not dead later on, and money and swag and goods keep changing hands with such regularity that, at one point, one guy is searching for something he already has (and doesn't know it), while another guy isn't searching for it because he thinks he has it...but doesn't.

title: Kill Me Tomorrow
overview: A reporter who needs cash for his son's operation is paid by a smuggler to take a murder rap.
tagline: Murder flawless as the diamond!

title: Naked Fury
overview: A gang of thieves led by American Eddy (Reed de Rouen) kill a security guard during a botched safe robbery and flee with his daughter (Leigh Madison) as a hostage. They hide out in a dangerously unstable old warehouse for a couple of days awaiting their getaway ship to sail, but Johnny (Kenneth Cope) falls for the girl - provoking a serious falling-out and a violent conclusion to the disastrous heist.
tagline: No one nowhere was safe

title: Headline Hunters
overview: A rookie reporter in pursuit of an expose gets tangled up with big-time mobsters.
tagline: As Shocking as an EXTRA!

title: Tag til marked i Fjordby
overview: Tag til marked i Fjordby is a 1957 Danish comedy film directed by Poul Bang and starring Dirch Passer.

title: Dead by Morning
overview: Gorgeous Kate Dax and her crime-writer husband, Andrew, investigate the murder of eccentric spinster Miss Tulip at a remote country cottage.
tagline: A spine tingling comedy-thriller!

title: Pan Anatol szuka miliona
overview: Mister Anatol investigates a gang of thieves looking after a young woman who has just won a lottery.

title: El fugitivo de Amberes
overview: A thief steals a Jewel in France and travels to Barcelona to try to sell it. Both the Police and a former associate try to catch him.

title: The Man Who Changed His Name
The Desperate Man
overview: Two reporters are held hostage in old castle, by thief, looking for jewels, that he had buried, after robbing a local house.

title: Nights of the Teddy Boys
overview: An Italian drama directed by Leopoldo Savona.

title: The Depraved
overview: Fed up with her wealthy but abusive husband, Tom (Basil Dignam), young English homemaker Laura Wilton (Anne Heywood) conspires with her lover, American Army captain Dave Dillon (Robert Arden), to have her boozy spouse meet an "accidental" demise. But a nosy copper (Denis Shaw) suspects foul play, and soon the lovers' crafty scheme deteriorates into fear, distrust and betrayal. Paul Dickson directs this vintage noir thriller.
tagline: A CHANCE ENCOUNTER LEADS TO A PERFECT MURDER PLOT

title: Farewell to the Devil
overview: A journalist investigates a mysterious murder in the countryside.

title: The Jubilee of Mr Ikel
overview: A man wakes up in his grave and realizes that he's been buried alive. He gets up and arrives home only to find out that his wife and relatives threw a party instead of mourning, looking forward to his big inheritance.

title: Police Judiciaire
overview: The detectives of the Paris Judicial Police, based at the Quai des Orfèvres, are mobilized by four criminal cases. A double murder, perpetrated in a hotel on the Place de Clichy, intrigues the investigators. The owner and a little maid were murdered in cold blood.

title: Rx Murder
overview: An American doctor, Jethro Jones, comes into a quiet British seaside community and becomes entangled in a murder mystery when the town gossips inform him that all of the three wives of the town doctor, Doctor Dysert (or Doctor Deadcert as they call him) have had mysterious deaths. And now Doctor Dysert is treating his own secretary, Kitty, who he wants to make her his next wife, as she has inexplicably fallen ill.
tagline: His Patients Loved Him To Their Murdered Day!

title: The Suspects
overview: Commissaire Perrache, the chief of the D.S.T., the French domestic intelligence service, tries to neutralize a group of terrorists named the Partisans de la Métropole. He sends one of his best agents, inspector Louis Vignon, incidentally the husband of his charming secretary Lucette, on the trail of an illegal transmitter. But Vignon gets kidnapped by the gang and held captive on a boat off the shores of Monaco...

title: La Môme Pigalle
overview: Released from prison, Arlette returns to her job as a cabaret star. The police try to get her to confess where the stolen jewels are hidden.

title: Illegal Cargo
overview: A female journalist beats two male rivals to a scoop by exposing a white slave racket going on right in 50s Paris.

title: Running Target
overview: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man. He is accompanied by Jaynes, a tavern owner, who takes much delight in his telescopic rifle, and by "Smitty," a gas station held up the escapees and more than ready to show she can be as tough as any man, although she seems to have some other motive for getting to the leader of the convicts, Kaygo.
tagline: Taste the terror . . . Smell the fear . . . Experience the raw, naked panic of a Running Target!

title: The Way to the Gold
overview: Following his release from prison, an ex-con heads straight for a cache of gold buried somewhere in a small village.
tagline: All roads lead to sweeping adventure and violent excitement on The Way to the Gold.

title: Fighting Trouble
overview: An overambitious shutterbug almost gets his lights put out permanently when he decides to snap a picture of a mob boss.
tagline: THOSE COOL KIDS YOU LOVE get the goods on the town's hottest hoods...with their super-duper crime camera!

title: Account Rendered
overview: Police find that everyone had a motive for the murder of a wealthy woman.
tagline: Suddenly in the Night...A Woman of Wayward Passions Pays for Her Evil!

title: Pehli Jhalak
overview: A woman rejects her father-approved groom, runs away, and falls in love with a petty thief/gambler.

title: Calling Homicide
overview: Cop Andy Doyle investigates a car-bombing murder and the killing of a sleazy modeling agency owner. Are they connected?
tagline: A racket that preys on beauty---and pays off with MURDER!

title: Queen Bee's Anger
overview: Part of the Queen Bee series.
